match.title: 5th ODI
match.statusText: South Africa won by 9 wickets (with 112 balls remaining)

image.caption: A view of the SuperSport Park from the stands
image.longCaption: A view of the SuperSport Park from the stands, South Africa v New Zealand, 2nd Test, Centurion, 2nd day, November 17, 2007

match.hoursInfo: 10.00 start, First Session 10.00-13.30 Interval 13.30-14.15, Second Session 14.15-17.45

headshotImage.caption: AB de Villiers headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: AB de Villiers headshot

dismissalText.commentary: Sachin Tendulkar c de Villiers b Kemp 55 (97b 8x4 0x6 134m) SR: 56.7

dismissalComment.html: de Villiers pulls off a stunner and we are back to square one. Too short and too wide outside the off stump - Tendulkar goes for the cut but fails to keeps it down, de Villiers at cover point drives across full length to his left and takes it as clean as a whistle.

headshotImage.caption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: MS Dhoni c Nel b Ntini 44 (49b 2x4 2x6 75m) SR: 89.79

dismissalComment.html: Et tu, Nel ! short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line - Dhoni swings across the line and the ball steeples towards wide long-on. Nel sprints in from the deep, throws himself full length to his left and takes a two handed blinder.

headshotImage.caption: Makhaya Ntini player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Makhaya Ntini player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Harbhajan Singh player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Harbhajan Singh player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: good length delivery outside the off stump, Harbhajan without fails goes after it but on this occasion the ball clips the outside edge and flies down to third man. Pollock moves across quickly to his left and takes it on the slide

dismissalComment.html: caught behind, you could see it coming, Pollock pitched that on a good length just outside off stump, the ball moved a shade away from Sehwag who played away from his body and got the edge

headshotImage.caption: VVS Laxman player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: and he lasts just one ball, very similar to the one that got Sehwag, pitches outside off on a good length, moves away ... Laxman feels for it away from his body and edges to first slip, Smith hangs on to a simple catch

dismissalText.commentary: Dinesh Mongia b Kemp 41 (89b 3x4 0x6 132m) SR: 46.06

dismissalComment.html: harmless delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Mongia moves across a long way( make that a mile)  in an effort to loft the ball down to fine leg but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the stumps.

dismissalText.commentary: Dinesh Karthik c Boucher b Nel 11 (15b 2x4 0x6 18m) SR: 73.33

dismissalComment.html: short of a good length delivery outside the off stump - bit of extra bounce there - Karthik looking to nudge it through the vacant slip area is done in by the extra bounce - ball slides off the face of the bat and goes straight to Boucher behind the stumps

dismissalText.commentary: Irfan Pathan b Kallis 7 (9b 0x4 0x6 16m) SR: 77.77

dismissalComment.html: good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Pathan moves away from the stumps in an attempt to.., well I don't know what he was trying to do there. Ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps - India six down

dismissalText.commentary: Graeme Smith c Karthik b Harbhajan Singh 79 (85b 7x4 3x6 143m) SR: 92.94

dismissalComment.html: Breakthrough! tossed up on the middle and leg stump line, Smith comes down the track and lofts it away towards long-on - Karthik in the deep times his jump to perfection and takes a smart catch. A fine partnership comes to an end.

headshotImage.caption: Shaun Pollock player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shaun Pollock player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: high fulltoss and it almost took out de Villiers - probably the yorker gone wrong - de Villiers manages to get bat on ball and an easy single down to third man completes the whitewash

commentPostTextItems.html: South Africa win by 9 wickets and It's the first time that India have suffered a clean sweep in a bilateral ODI series since 1997, when Sri Lanka beat them 3-0, with one match being washed out. South Africa outplayed India in each and every department of the game. The drubbing was ruthlessly consistent and India were never in the picture after they were bundled out for 91 in the first match.

To be fair the Indian bowlers did a good job throughout the series barring this final encounter and if there is any positive to be taken forward into the test series that would be it. For the record this is India's 6th defeats in a row, the last time they had such a losing sequence was in 1988-89, when they lost seven in a row.
Pollock bags both the Man-of-the-match and the Man-of-the-series awards for his outstanding performance throughout the series. What a player - is he getting older or younger?

Hope you have enjoyed the coverage, I know it's a cruel statement to make, especially if you are an Indian supporter...The first Test starts on the 15th of this month and we will be on live well before the first ball is bowled. For the time being though this is Sajan Nair along with George Binoy signing off - good night and good luck.

commentTextItems.html: short ball - pulled away to the midwicket fence. So what is new! just two more needed now
short of a good length and this one nipped back in a touch - de Villiers is beaten on the forward prod
glanced away off the back-foot and the ball rolls away square on the leg side

commentPostTextItems.html: South Africa are on the verge of whitewashing India 4-0 in the one-day series. Today's win at Centurion will be as comprehensive as any of the other thrashings. They outplayed India with the bat, ball and in the field. Such was the South African domination that the Indian body language in the field was a let down. South Africa hold a tremendous psychological advantage going into the Test series. Send us your thoughts on the performances of both teams in the series.

image.caption: Shaun Pollock profile
image.credit: United Cricket Board of South Africa

commentTextItems.html: turned away towards square leg for a single
quicker delivery and de Villiers leaves it through to the keeper -  probably getting into Test mode.
on the middle and leg stump line, defended on the back-foot.
quicker delivery, defended on the front-foot
doosra first up, steered away towards gully
short and angling across - cut away to third man for an easy single

image.caption: Shaun Pollock profile
image.credit: United Cricket Board of South Africa

headshotImage.longCaption: Harbhajan Singh player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: four more! short of a length and wide outside the off stump. Pollock comes down the track  like a Viking in a batting helmet and dismisses it over the fielder at midwicket
ah they have a flight to catch - short ball, pitched outside the leg stump and angling in. Pollock leans back a bit, makes room and pulls it away to the midwicket fence
another wide delivery and once again Pollock goes for it but this time the ball rolls away off the edge
short of a good length delivery, pitched in line and angling across. Pollock moves back and across and straight bats it over mid-off. No protection in the deep and the ball rolls over the ropes
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, driven away through cover for a single
worked away on the leg side

commentTextItems.html: wristfully flicked away through square leg for an easy single
nudged away to midwicket - one more added to the total
off the mark first ball - tossed up and turning in, Pollock gets forward and drives it down to long-off

dismissalText.commentary: Graeme Smith c Karthik b Harbhajan Singh 79 (85b 7x4 3x6 143m) SR: 92.94

dismissalComment.html: Breakthrough! tossed up on the middle and leg stump line, Smith comes down the track and lofts it away towards long-on - Karthik in the deep times his jump to perfection and takes a smart catch. A fine partnership comes to an end.

notes: India innings
Drinks: India - 34/2 in 17.0 overs (SR Tendulkar 11, D Mongia 6)
India: 50 runs in 19.4 overs (121 balls), Extras 7
3rd Wicket: 50 runs in 103 balls (SR Tendulkar 35, D Mongia 16, Ex 2)
SR Tendulkar: 50 off 86 balls (8 x 4)
India: 100 runs in 29.6 overs (183 balls), Extras 10
Drinks: India - 103/3 in 31.4 overs (D Mongia 27)
India: 150 runs in 42.2 overs (258 balls), Extras 12
India: 200 runs in 49.4 overs (302 balls), Extras 13
South Africa innings
South Africa: 50 runs in 7.4 overs (51 balls), Extras 5
1st Wicket: 50 runs in 51 balls (GC Smith 21, AB de Villiers 26, Ex 5)
AB de Villiers: 50 off 50 balls (9 x 4)
Drinks: South Africa - 95/0 in 16.0 overs (GC Smith 34, AB de Villiers 51)
Lunch: South Africa - 0/0
South Africa: 100 runs in 16.6 overs (108 balls), Extras 10
1st Wicket: 100 runs in 108 balls (GC Smith 36, AB de Villiers 55, Ex 10)
GC Smith: 50 off 61 balls (6 x 4, 1 x 6)
South Africa: 150 runs in 25.2 overs (160 balls), Extras 12
1st Wicket: 150 runs in 160 balls (GC Smith 69, AB de Villiers 69, Ex 12)
South Africa: 200 runs in 31.2 overs (198 balls), Extras 14

stories.title: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.subTitle: December 3, 2006

stories.title: 'Our bowlers were fantastic' - Smith
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary: Graeme Smith and Shaun Pollock spoke to the media after the South African triumph

stories.title: Indian fan taken into custody
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary:
An Indian fan was taken into custody in connection with an assault in one
of the hospitality boxes adjoining the Indian dressing-room at SuperSport
Park in Centurion

stories.title: 'We haven't come to grips with the conditions' - Chappell
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.seoTitle: 'We haven't come to grips with the conditions' - Chappell
stories.summary: Greg Chappell made no excuses after a shocking display that summed up India's one-day series

stories.title: AB's blast and a good-luck message
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary: Any hopes of India turning the corner after the Twenty20 victory was quickly dispelled as South Africa drubbed them by nine wickets to seal a hopelessly one-sided series 4-0.

stories.title: Pollock defies the critics
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary:
In truth, India deserved no better. The pitch did a bit early on, but the
batting was so tardy that a score of 250 was a chimera midway through the
innings
stories.byline: The Verdict by Dileep Premachandran in Centurion

stories.title: Smith gets out of a rut
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.seoTitle: Smith gets out of a rut
stories.summary: Stats highlights from the South Africa-India match at Centurion

stories.title: South Africa complete whitewash
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary: Any hopes of India turning the corner after the Twenty20 victory was quickly dispelled as South Africa drubbed them by nine wickets to seal a hopelessly one-sided series 4-0.

stories.title: Slings, arrows and the short stuff
stories.subTitle: Coping with the ups and downs of a tough tour
stories.seoTitle: Slings, arrows and the short stuff
stories.summary: India's seniors try and console the young players who are copping the flak for the team's debacle

stories.title: India face a test of character
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary:
Boosted by their victory in the Pro20 game on Friday night, India's
cricketers head to Centurion on Sunday seeking to avoid a 4-0 drubbing in
the one-day series
stories.byline: The Preview by Dileep Premachandran at Centurion

videos.title: There was just one team on the park
videos.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
videos.summary: After a 4-0 rout the Indians need to show lot of character if they have to put up fight in the Test series

galleries.title: Smith & de Villiers complete whitewash

stories.title: Indian fan taken into custody
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.summary:
An Indian fan was taken into custody in connection with an assault in one
of the hospitality boxes adjoining the Indian dressing-room at SuperSport
Park in Centurion

stories.title: 'We haven't come to grips with the conditions' - Chappell
stories.subTitle: South Africa v India, 5th ODI, Centurion
stories.seoTitle: 'We haven't come to grips with the conditions' - Chappell
stories.summary: Greg Chappell made no excuses after a shocking display that summed up India's one-day series
